doc.title: Faces & Names
doc.plot: Faces & Names takes you behind the scenes of Hollywood, to the movie sets with top directors and stars, to film festivals and special events, and one on one in-depth interviews with the hottest stars of Hollywood, such as Michael Caine, Robert Duval, Ben Kingsley, Janet Leigh, Laura Linney, Fayard Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers, Julian Sands. It also features biographies of musical stars, such as Russian pop star Igo Nikolaev, Italian pop star Girogia, jazz star Nnenna Freelon, and the stars of Riverdance.
